text:
'jecvi - P
Antioch College
Yellow Springs, Ohio
May 18, 1956
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen;
Our college radio station, WAYC, is in the
process of reorganizing—possibly into a com¬
bination FM-Closed Circuit station. Would
you send us information about membership in
the NAEB?
Sincerely,
Eleanor Wensberg
